author: William Little
description: Peach and bourbon are a match made in heaven, presented here with a touch of citrus (also classically great with black tea) and zesty orange. A classic pairing of harmonious flavours.
name: Bourbon Peach Tea
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Brewed cold black breakfast tea

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
